ticket.title: CLI dual-socket + protocol client alignment (no JSON IPC)

tickets.reason: ProtocolServer dispatchers must be reachable before CLI can use tag-based IPC.

in_scope: Read operator_socket/session_socket from config; ignore daemon.socket.
Implement tag-based protocol clients for operator/session sockets.
Expose minimal agent command set for work/episode/evidence/event operations.
out_of_scope: Extending legacy JSON IPC client support.

steps: Add operator/session protocol clients in apm2-cli.
Replace JSON IpcRequest usage in episode/work commands.
Deprecate --socket and map to operator_socket only.
Add tests for routing and deterministic exit codes.

criteria: Privileged CLI commands use operator_socket with tag-based protocol frames.
Session CLI commands use session_socket with tag-based protocol frames.
Deprecated --socket prints warning and maps to operator_socket only.

notes.security:
CLI must never send JSON IPC over operator.sock/session.sock. Protocol
selection is strict and fail-closed.
notes.verification:
IT-00288-01: cargo test -p apm2-cli operator_socket_routing
IT-00288-02: cargo test -p apm2-cli session_socket_routing
notes.general: This ticket makes the CLI an agent-usable interface after DD-009 routing cutover.
